channel.title: Project Sierra - Need Team
channel.description:
[font=arial] [size=14pt][b]What Is Project Sierra?[/b][/size] [i]Project Sierra is a project that does not just include a server. For if it were just a server, it would not be much of a project. The project will[And Is] consisting of three sections. Server(Me), Client(OPEN), VB Client(OPEN). [/i]
[size=14pt][b][u]Expectations[/u][/b][/size] [i]- This will be gradually stretched out[/i]
[size=12pt][b]Server[/b][/size] [i]Well, I am in charge of the server, and I am making it very diverse and text-based. I am making it very customizable and very complicated. It will not be a 'noob-friendly' source because. . . a good source should not be 'noob friendly'.[/i]
[size=12pt][b]Client[/b][/size] [i]You can expect the client to be a bit different. I have no idea how we will set this up, for I know nearly nothing about the Runescape client.[/i]
[size=12pt][b]Visual Basic Client[/b][/size] [i]Well, The Visual Basic client will be comparable to SwiftSwitch. The tabs will include(I think):
[ul][li][font=arial]Moparscape Forums[/li] [li][font=arial]Item/NPC/Object list[/li] [li][font=arial]Server Integration[/li] [li][font=arial]Server Status(Remembers Server List)[/li] [li][font=arial]File-Editing Notepad[/li][/ul]
[hr][font=arial] You can sign up for any of the above. Also, do not join unless you KNOW you can code great. That means code something different than everybody else. [size=20pt]In need of Server Hoster (Remote Desktop Access)[/size][/font]

item.title: Project Sierra - Need Team
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

No. The regular client will be just like normal runescape (Maybe gui for a few things. Not much though. . .)
The VB client (Visual Basic) will have those features. If you want an example of a VB client: SwiftSwitch

Read full topic

* Moparscape Forums
* Item/NPC/Object list
* Server Integration
* Server Status(Remembers Server List)
* File-Editing Notepad

???

Read full topic

item.title: Project Sierra - Need Team
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[font=arial]
[size=14pt]What Is Project Sierra?[/size]
Project Sierra is a project that does not just include a server. For if it were just a server, it would not be much of a project. The project will[And Is] consisting of three sections. Server(Me), Client(OPEN), VB Client(OPEN).

[size=14pt]Expectations[/size] - This will be gradually stretched out

[size=12pt]Server[/size]
Well, I am in charge of the server, and I am making it very diverse and text-based. I am making it very customizable and very complicated. It will not be a ‘noob-friendly’ source because. . . a good source should not be ‘noob friendly’.

[size=12pt]Client[/size]
You can expect the client to be a bit different. I have no idea how we will set this up, for I know nearly nothing about the Runescape client.

[size=12pt]Visual Basic Client[/size]
[i]Well, The Visual Basic client will be comparable to SwiftSwitch. The tabs will include(I think):

[ul][li][font=arial]Moparscape Forums[/li]
[li][font=arial]Item/NPC/Object list[/li]
[li][font=arial]Server Integration[/li]
[li][font=arial]Server Status(Remembers Server List)[/li]
[li][font=arial]File-Editing Notepad[/li][/ul]

[hr][font=arial]
You can sign up for any of the above. Also, do not join unless you KNOW you can code great. That means code something different than everybody else.
[size=20pt]In need of Server Hoster (Remote Desktop Access)[/size][/font]

Read full topic
